alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Bayfield; Burnett; Douglas; Iron; Washburn (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 19 at 3:05AM CST until February 21 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM MONDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Douglas, Bayfield, Ashland, Iron, Burnett and Washburn Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Red Cliff Band and the Bad River Reservation. * WHEN...From 6 AM Monday to midnight CST Monday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highest amounts near Lake Superior.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Ashland; Bayfield; Burnett; Douglas; Iron; Washburn
